title: Why Tropical Storm Nicole Is So ‘Unusual’
description: Experts say Tropical Storm Nicole has a hurricane-style warm core, but it is wrapped in a vast, lopsided wind shield that more resembles a cold-core storm.
dc:creator: Judson Jones
media:credit: Paul Hennessy/Sipa USA, via Associated Press
media:description: The area that forecasters say will be affected by the storm stretches far to the north, all the way to the Carolinas, while areas much closer to its probable landfall, like the Florida Keys, will remain relatively unscathed.
